1 
Applying for Mobile App Developer Position 
o  Profile 
•  Full Name 
: Do Tuan Vuong 
•  Birthday  
: 1992 
•  Sex  
: Male 
•  Nationality   
: Vietnam   
•  Specialize in developing Android (Java /Flutter) native apps for more than 3 years. 
•  Having great experience in developing Client - Server applications based on REST API.  
•  Working on a broad variety of projects: mobile delivery apps, mobile booking apps, educational and 
fitness apps as well as working with applications requiring different technologies and skills. 
•  Publishing the own applications in Google Play; being familiar with every step of mobile development 
cycle from an idea to publishing it in the stores. 
o  Priorities:  
•  Clean and readable code. 
•  Bug-free. 
•  Delivery in a timely manner 
o  Skill 
●  Java Android  
●  Kotlin Android 
●  Flutter Framework 
●  GIT 
●  Android Studio 
●  Visual Studio Code 
●  Self-Study 
●  Team leadership 
2 
Language 
●  English 
Hobbies 
●  Play badminton/Football 
●  Listening music 
●  Researching 
o  Employment Experience 
Oct 2017 – Present 
Android Developer at Sutrix Solutions, Ho Chi Minh city 
Projects: 
●  GlobeOne: Data & Promos application (Nativescript Framework) 
Time: August 2019 - Present 
Project Overview: Keep track of your data, pay your bills, subscribe to the latest promos, and check 
your prepaid load anytime and anywhere 
Team size: over 10 people 
Core features: 
-  
Manage multiple postpaid and prepaid mobile accounts 
-  
Monitor your remaining data 
-  
View and download your current and previous bills 
-  
Pay your bills 
-  
Track your monthly spending 
-  
Subscribe and unsubscribe to promos 
-  
Check your load balance and loading history 
-  
View your rewards points 
Responsibilities: Building NativeScript plugins, Track & Fix bug on Android platform  
-  
Track & fix bug on android platform 
-  
Build & Integrate Biometric Plugin for android platform 
-  
Build & Integrate Notification Plugin for android platform 
-  
Experience build plugin nativescript 
●  ONEdna: Health & Fitness application (Android & iOS Native Framework) 
Time: April 2018 - December 2018 
3 
Project Overview: ONEdna is a holistic health platform designed to be user's DNA-based health 
navigator. Gain access to user's DNA information and use it to become healthier with support from the 
user's own health coach! Onedna is a tool that allows the user to track and improve the user's health 
Team size: over 10 people 
Core features: 
-  
Get in touch with your health coach for fitness, health or general wellbeing advice 
-  
Get an instant nutritional breakdown after uploading a picture to our innovative AI-powered food 
tracker 
-  
Track your physical activity and weight to calculate optimal calorie consumption (steps data is 
integrated with Apple's Health App) 
-  
Earn points for your efforts in the app 
-  
Win exciting prizes from our monthly lucky draw, and much more 
Responsibilities: Development android platform 
-  
Draw chart activity & weight 
-  
Localization

Download/Review file

-  
Integrate Mixpanel analytics 
●  SFM: Management Project application (Android Native Framework) 
Time: October 2017 - January 2018 
Project Overview: SFM is a new editor that blends notes, tasks, wikis in one app. 
Team size: 4 people 
Core features: 
-  
Use drag & drop and Force Touch to arrange any content. Great for prioritizing lists and to-dos. 
-  
Supports images, to-dos, bookmarks
